widget.name: App events
widget.description: Perform actions on all kinds of events

property.caption: On load
property.description: The moment this widget is created.

property.caption: On unload
property.description: The moment this widget is destroyed.

property.caption: On pause
property.description: The user navigated to another app or the home screen, which pauses the app.

property.caption: On resume
property.description: The user navigated back to this app.

property.caption: On resume timeout
property.description: Only call the on resume action, if it was this amount of seconds after the last time the app was resumed (or started).

property.caption: On inactive
property.description: The user is currently transitioning between foreground and background, or entered a period of inactivity by using the multitasking view or receiving an incoming call.

property.caption: On online
property.description: The device network status changed to online. Also called on load if online.

property.caption: On online timeout
property.description: Only call the on online action, if it was this amount of seconds after the last time the device came online.

property.caption: On offline
property.description: The device network status changed to offline. Also called on load if offline.

property.caption: On show
property.description: The on screen keyboard was opened

property.caption: On hide
property.description: The on screen keyboard was closed

property.caption: Interval events
property.description: Call an action based on an interval, until this widget is destroyed.

property.caption: Interval
property.description: Defines how often the action is called, in seconds.
